item.title: About
item.description: Alwin Arrasyid is a software engineer, public speaker and trainer around internet of things topic, also an enthusiast of technology in general. Alwin has spoken in various IoT-related events such as Road to Republic of IoT, Republic of IoT, Republic of IoT Strikes Back! and another big events such as Global Azure Bootcamp, Python Conference ID 2017 at Surabaya representing DycodeX as the gold sponsor of the event. Alwin is currently working as Lead Software Engineer at DycodeX, an IoT solutions and maker movement enabler company.
